titles.title: A resolution celebrating the 160th anniversary of the Ladies Christian Association, which became the Young Women's Christian Association.
A resolution celebrating the 160th anniversary of the Ladies Christian Association, which became the Young Women's Christian Association.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Celebrates the 160th anniversary of the Ladies Christian Association, which became the Young Women's Christian Association (YWCA). Supports the YWCA's policies for eliminating racism, empowering women, and promoting peace, justice, freedom, and dignity for all.
